alert.note: Alert for Van Buren; Warren (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 16 at 6:10PM CST until February 16 at 6:45PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Van Buren County in Middle Tennessee... Southeastern Warren County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 645 PM CST. * At 610 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of McMinnville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... McMinnville and Spencer. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for Middle Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for Middle Tennessee.
